Package accounts.bank.managing.thesis.bachelor.rastvdmy.service

Class TransferService

java.lang.Object
accounts.bank.managing.thesis.bachelor.rastvdmy.service.TransferService
@Service public class TransferService extends Object
This class is responsible for managing transfers. It is annotated with @Service to indicate that it's a Spring managed service. It uses TransferRepository, CardRepository, and CurrencyDataRepository to interact with the database.

      Constructs a new TransferService with the given repositories.

      transferRepository - The TransferRepository to use.
      cardRepository - The CardRepository to use.
      currencyDataService - The CurrencyDataService to use.

  • Method Details

    • getTransfers

      @Cacheable("transfers") public List<Transfer> getTransfers()
      Retrieves all transfers.
      Returns:
      A list of all transfers.

    • filterAndSortTransfers

      @Cacheable("transfers") public org.springframework.data.domain.Page<Transfer> filterAndSortTransfers(org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)
      Retrieves transfers with filtering and sorting.
      Parameters:
      pageable - The pagination information.
      Returns:
      A page of transfers.

    • getTransferById

      @Cacheable(value="transfers", key="#transferId") public Transfer getTransferById(Long transferId)
      Retrieves a transfer by its ID.
      Parameters:
      transferId - The ID of the transfer to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The retrieved transfer.

    • getTransferByReferenceNumber

      @Cacheable(value="transfers", key="#referenceNumber") public Transfer getTransferByReferenceNumber(String referenceNumber)
      Retrieves a transfer by its reference number.
      Parameters:
      referenceNumber - The reference number of the transfer to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The retrieved transfer.

    • createTransfer

      @CacheEvict(value={"transfers","cards"}, allEntries=true) public Transfer createTransfer(Long senderId, String receiverCardNumber, BigDecimal amount, String description)
      Creates a transfer from one card to another.
      Parameters:
      senderId - The ID of the sender's card.
      receiverCardNumber - The card number of the receiver.
      amount - The amount to transfer.
      description - The description of the transfer.
      Returns:
      The created transfer.
